full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Nutanix Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support for SSC

**Title**: BPM019844-R000151928

**Reference Number**: SSC-23-00024215:T

**Publication Date**: October 24, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: November 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Amendment Information**:
The solicitation has been amended once.

**Procurement Details**:
This procurement involves the provision of Nutanix hardware and software maintenance and support services for Shared Services Canada (SSC). The selected service provider will be required to provide ongoing maintenance and support for SSC's Nutanix infrastructure.

**Security Requirements**:
This solicitation contains security requirements that must be met by all prospective service providers.

**Trade Agreements**:
The following trade agreements apply to this procurement process:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Peru Free Trade Agreement

**Bidder Inquiries**:
Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca).

**Accessing the Solicitation**:
Prospective bidders can access the solicitation through the [P2P Portal](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public) under Solicitation List: BPM019844.

**Contact Information**:
For further information, please contact:
Eric Lavigne
Phone: 343-541-8756
Fax: 613-960-6026
